text: Enzo Robutti (24 October 1933 â€“ 13 February 2022) was an Italian actor, comedian, playwright, and writer. He was born in Bologna, Italy. His career began in 1963 and he retired in 1988. His best known works were Il Profeta, Tell Me You Do Everything for Me and Dog's Heart. Robutti died on 13 February 2022 in Viterbo, Italy at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian playwrights Category:Italian comedians
title: Enzo Robutti
